channel.title: How to make NPCs give you an item only once?
channel.description: So, on my source, santa clause will give you an item for talking to him, but once the dialogue is over, you can just talk to him again and get it. How do I fix this?

item.title: How to make NPCs give you an item only once?
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

So, on my source, santa clause will give you an item for talking to him, but once the dialogue is over, you can just talk to him again and get it. How do I fix this?

Read full topic
item.source: How to make NPCs give you an item only once?
